gov.va.med.srcalc.vista

Interface VistaProcedureCaller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VistaLinkProcedureCaller

    public interface VistaProcedureCaller
    An object that can call VistA Remote Procedures.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String doRetrieveLabsCall(java.lang.String duz, java.lang.String patientDfn, java.util.List<java.lang.String> labNames)
      A special-purpose method to call RemoteProcedure.SR_ASRC_LAB_RESULTS because it requires a List parameter.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> doRpc(java.lang.String duz, RemoteProcedure procedure, java.lang.String... args)
      Performs a generic Remote Procedure Call with all-string parameters.
      java.lang.String doSaveProgressNoteCall(java.lang.String duz, java.lang.String encryptedSignature, java.lang.String patientDfn, java.util.List<java.lang.String> noteLines)
      A special-purpose method to call RemoteProcedure.SR_ASRC_SAVE_PROGRESS_NOTE because its parameters are complex.
      java.lang.String doSaveRiskCalculationCall(java.lang.String duz, java.lang.String patientDfn, java.lang.String cptCode, java.lang.String dateTime, java.util.List<java.lang.String> outcomes)
      A special-purpose method to call RemoteProcedure.SR_ASRC_RISK_SAVE because it requires a List parameter.
      java.lang.String getDivision()
      Returns the division identifier (including any suffix) for the target VistA.

    • Method Detail

      • doRpc

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> doRpc(java.lang.String duz,
                                     RemoteProcedure procedure,
                                     java.lang.String... args)
                                       throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException,
                                              org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        Performs a generic Remote Procedure Call with all-string parameters.
        Parameters:
        duz - the calling user's DUZ
        procedure - the remote procedure to call
        args - the remote procedure arguments, if any
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of String lines from the response
        Throws:
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException - if unable to authenticate with VistA
        ConfigurationException - if some misconfiguration prevents communication
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if some error occurred communicating with VistA

      • doSaveProgressNoteCall

        java.lang.String doSaveProgressNoteCall(java.lang.String duz,
                                      java.lang.String encryptedSignature,
                                      java.lang.String patientDfn,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> noteLines)
                                        throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException,
                                               org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        A special-purpose method to call RemoteProcedure.SR_ASRC_SAVE_PROGRESS_NOTE because its parameters are complex.
        Parameters:
        duz - the calling user's DUZ (also the signer)
        encryptedSignature - the user's electronic signature code
        patientDfn - the associated patient's DFN
        noteLines - a List of note body lines
        Returns:
        the VistA response as a String (See RemoteProcedure.VALID_SIGNATURE_RETURN.)
        Throws:
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException - if unable to authenticate as the calling user with VistA
        ConfigurationException - if some misconfiguration prevents communication
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if some error occurred communicating with VistA

      • doSaveRiskCalculationCall

        java.lang.String doSaveRiskCalculationCall(java.lang.String duz,
                                         java.lang.String patientDfn,
                                         java.lang.String cptCode,
                                         java.lang.String dateTime,
                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> outcomes)
                                           throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException,
                                                  org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        A special-purpose method to call RemoteProcedure.SR_ASRC_RISK_SAVE because it requires a List parameter.
        Parameters:
        duz - the calling user's DUZ
        patientDfn - the associated patient's DFN
        cptCode - the CPT code to store (optional, may be an empty string)
        dateTime - the signature date/time in MM/DD/YYYY@HHMM format
        outcomes - the list of outcomes, each outcoming as a String "Outcome name^XX.X"
        Returns:
        the VistA response as a String. (See RemoteProcedure.RISK_SAVED_RETURN.)
        Throws:
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException - if no VistA user could be matched to the given DUZ
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if some error occurred communicating with VistA

      • doRetrieveLabsCall

        java.lang.String doRetrieveLabsCall(java.lang.String duz,
                                  java.lang.String patientDfn,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> labNames)
                                    throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException,
                                           org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        A special-purpose method to call RemoteProcedure.SR_ASRC_LAB_RESULTS because it requires a List parameter.
        Parameters:
        duz - the calling user's DUZ
        patientDfn - the associated patient's DFN
        labNames - the list of potential lab names to retrieve results for
        Returns:
        the VistA response as a String.
        Throws:
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException - if no VistA user could be matched to the given DUZ
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - if some error occurred communicating with VistA

      • getDivision

        java.lang.String getDivision()
        Returns the division identifier (including any suffix) for the target VistA.
